name: transport, tram | transport, tram | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/373/documentation

Inventory refers to the entire transport life cycle. For the attribution of vehicle share to the transport performance a vehicle life time performance of 59'100’000 pkm/vehicle have been assumed. This dataset includes as well the energy use and combustion emission of a tram in Switzerland.

The energy use and combustion emissions service starts with electricity consumption.

operation of vehicle; production and maintenance of vehicles; construction of road. The energy use and combustion emissions service ends with the service of transporting 1 vehicle over 1 kilometre. The dataset includes electricity consumption, particulate emissions and until and including heavy metal emission (iron).
category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4921:Urban and suburban passenger land transport

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The data for vehicle operation and infrastructure reflect Swiss conditions. Data for vehicle manufacturing and maintenance represents generic European data. Data for the vehicle disposal reflect Swiss situation. The data of the energy use and combustion emissions refers to average regional transport conditions in Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: For vehicle operation all technologies are included in the average data. For the energy use and combustion emissions, tram transport abrasions tyre and brake emissions are taking into account
